name: Sagar Sawuck
description: Passionate Developer with a strong notion of backend fundamentals and technologies. Possess a broad overview of multiple technologies involved in the creation of Websites and Software, specializing in the Frontend development ecosystem. Highly focused, with comprehensive knowledge of designing and developing the layout, visual appearance and interaction of a website, with focus on usability and design principles. Belief in lifelong learning, eager learner, attentive to details, highly adaptive, clear logical mindset with a practical approach to problem solving and a drive to see things I undertake through to completion.
title: Web developer, specializing in frontend development
